comments: Partial sums are A004275. Binomial transform is A048492, starting with 0. - _Paul Barry_, Feb 28 2003
references: O. Deveci, Y. Akuzum, E. Karaduman, O. Erdag, The Cyclic Groups via Bezout Matrices, Journal of Mathematics Research, Vol. 7, No. 2, 2015, pp. 34-41.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Fibonacci n-Step Number
maple: P:=proc(n) local a,i; for i from 0 by 1 to n do a:=2*((i+2) mod (i+1))-(binomial((i)^2,i+2) mod 2)-(binomial((i+1)^2,i+3) mod 2); print(a); od; end: P(100); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Sep 03 2007
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _R. K. Guy_
